mapper.select: SELECT iuser, upw, nm, pic FROM t_user WHERE uid = #{uid}

SELECT A.nm, A.created_at AS createdAt, COUNT(B.ifeed) AS feedCnt , IFNULL(C.favCnt, 0) AS favCnt FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN t_feed B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.iuser, COUNT(A.ifeed) favCnt FROM t_feed A INNER JOIN t_favorite B ON A.ifeed = B.ifeed WHERE A.iuser = #{iuser} ) C ON A.iuser = C.iuser WHERE A.iuser = #{iuser};
